description.en:
Uenohara has had her eyes set on confessing to her friend, Sakuraba for awhile now, but she hasn't been brave enough to say anything. That was until she spots Sakuraba possible being confessed to and that’s when she knows she needs to act fast! Uenohara then hatches a plan to get them locked together overnight in the storage room to finally gain the courage to confess her love. It’s now or never and she’ll use every bit of sex appeal to snare her one true love!

1. Bikini no Housoku (ビキニの法則, Rule of Bikini); Comic Kairakuten 2011-07
2. I LOCK YOU!; Comic Kairakuten 2012-08 + kakioroshi
3. Natsu no Kemono (なつのけもの, Summer's Beast); Comic Kairakuten 2012-02
4. Be Natural ♡; Comic Kairakuten 2013-07
5. Renai Sample (レンアイサンプル,Love Sample); Comic Kairakuten 2013-02 + kakioroshi
6. Shinkyori Renai (至近距離恋愛, Point-Blank Love); Comic Kairakuten 2012-02
7. Chinmoku Hime (沈黙姫, Silent Princess); Comic Kairakuten 2013-05
8. Koakuma @ Home (小悪魔@ほーむ, Little Devil @ Home); Comic Kairakuten 2012-06
9. Imouto ☆ Chuiihou (妹☆注意報, Younger Sister ★ Warning); Comic Kairakuten 2013-09 + kakioroshi
10. Girlfriend (ガールフレンド); Comic Kairakuten 2012-01 + kakioroshi
11. Urahara Teacher ♡ (うらはらティーチャー♡, Contrary Teacher ♡); Comic Kairakuten 2012-03
12. Ia Ia!? Teacher ♡ (いやいや!? ティーチャー♡, No, No!? Teacher ♡); Comic Kairakuten 2012-03
13. YOU LOCK ME!!!; Comic Kairakuten 2012-08
14. Sono Ato no Kemono (その後のけもの, The Beast After That); Comic Kairakuten 2012-12
15. Bousou Hime ♡ (暴走姫♡, Running Wild Princess ♡); Comic Kairakuten 2013-05

-female: bikini, blowjob, big breasts, creampie, defloration, deepthroat, handjob, housewife, nakadashi, osananajimi, paizuri, schoolgirl uniform, sister, small breasts, stockings, swimsuit, tsundere, x-ray

biography.en:
Homunculus (ホムンクルス) is one of the top eromanga artists in the industry. His first two books, Bashful Break and [Renai Sample](https://mangadex.org/title/08e99300-47ac-496e-8695-3f05c7ebceea/), have both reached several top-selling tankōbon lists in Japan. 
Homunculus is part of the doujinshi circle Undercover Brothers alongside their friend [Sugaishi](https://mangadex.org/author/ad0fcc86-8408-4265-ac15-1ab2557dabac/).
Homunculus made his first appearance in the July 2009 issue of Comic Kairakuten with his debut work "Training Days". Comic Kairakuten's been publishing his works from time to time since then.

### Alternative Names: ホムンクルス

### Circles: Undercover Brothers

### Trackers:

- [AniList](https://anilist.co/staff/107354/)
- [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/author/n74zqxb/)
- [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/people/12354/)
